data.text:

#ServusVienna #ExpatCityRanking https://t.co/AeizF9Iw4p

data.text: Tomorrow, Monday 28 November, there will be no rail service due to a national strike in Austria. Please keep in mind that public transport to the airport is only possible with the rail replacement service of the City Airport Train or with the Vienna Airport Lines bus line! https://t.co/hjlQUu38Fn

Mit Austrian Airlines findet das #Friedenslicht heute zum 36. Mal seinen Weg nach Wien!🕯️Das Friedenslichtkind Sarah entzündet die Flamme in Betlehem.❤️Wir sind stolz, dass wir als Unternehmen seit der ersten Stunde, Teil dieser langjährigen Tradition sind.✈️ https://t.co/KIJhtbopb0

With the new pre-order, we turn your flight into a culinary journey! If you are travelling on short-& medium-haul flights in economy class, you can pick your meal before departure. An important step towards greater sustainability and against food waste 👉🏼 https://t.co/nfM9hcxyl7

data.text: Our buffets in the lounges are free of single use plastic items and all meals are prepared on demand to reduce food waste. Also our wines come from local vineyards, produced by local farmers and the vast majority of our lounges' food is sourced nationally. ✈️ #MakeChangeFly 2/2

data.text: Besides flights to the Mediterranean, long-haul flights will of course also have a lot to offer again next summer, such as non-stop flights from Vienna to Los Angeles. You can book all summer flight schedule destinations now at https://t.co/YLEBDoSwT7! 📲 3/3

urls.title: Book now and discover the most beautiful destinations
urls.description: Even in these times, we bring you safely to your desired destination. Whether on the ground or in the air: we always pay attention to hygiene and your health.

data.text: We are expanding our summer flight schedule with Porto, Marseille, Billund, Palermo, Tromsö, Vilnius and Tivat which makes us the clear number 1 in Austria. ✈️ 2/3

Can't stop thinking about next summer during the frosty winter months?  Then we have something for you: with 120 destinations and 1200 flights per week, our Austrian summer flight schedule offers you enough opportunities to dance into the sunset! ☀️ 1/3

#ServusA320neo! ❤️👋🏼 Just before the weekend kick-off, an @_austrian team transferred our second #A320neo ✈️ from Toulouse to Vienna. Our newest and more fuel-efficient addition to the fleet will be named #Seewinkel and takes off on its first passenger flight in December 2022. https://t.co/X7AasZCnky

3/3
CEO Annette Mann: “The Austrian team fought for this result in spite of strong headwinds. We are proud to be able to repay the state-backed loan in full early thanks to this team effort! We say thank you!"

Find the press release here: https://t.co/5DjTdF6b28

urls.title: Austrian Airlines says ‘thank you’: Strong third quarter and repayment of state-backed loan put Austrian Airlines back on course - Austrian Airlines
urls.description: After two and a half years of crisis, Austrian Airlines flew back into the black with a record summer. In spite of numerous systemic challenges in European

data.text:
2/3
Austrian Airlines closed the third quarter with a three-digit plus at 110 million euro. This summer, the 🇦🇹 flag carrier flew over 4 million guests with a regularity rate of 99.2% this summer. The early end of the salary waiver underlines the upswing at Austrian Airlines.

1/3 
Danke! ❤️ We say thank you! 🇦🇹✈️ #WeAreAustrian 
Three years earlier than planned, we will repay the state backed loan in full by the end of the year. We thank our passengers, the Austrian government, our partners and our #AustrianTeam! https://t.co/tvbjxdu28X

Today we proudly welcomed our newest fleet member, our first @Airbus #A320neo. Federal Minister @MagratheanTimes & our board christened our new aircraft “Donau-Auen”.

data.text: We are honored to have hosted today's crisis response training within the @_austrian Maintenance Hangar and on one of our aircraft ✈️ Trainings like this make a significant contribution to ensure the safety of our passengers and crew members! https://t.co/iBLjpJcHS5

#65years have never looked better! 🎉

Today, 65 years ago, was the birth of Austrian Airlines, or our "AUA" as it is affectionately known in Austria, until today. 🇦🇹

We are curious: when did you fly with us for the first time? ✈️💖

#WeAreAustrian #FeelsLikeAustrian https://t.co/rQgMLKu9Uc

urls.title: Seminar – Visit Austrian
urls.description: Sie sehen, wie die Tragflächen schwingen, als ob sie jeden Moment brechen würden. Sie hören ein Geräusch und denken sofort an eine Unregelmäßigkeit. Ihre Handflächen werden feucht und kalt, Ihr Herz klopft und Ihr Magen krampft sich zusammen. Alles in Ihnen wehrt sich gegen weitere Minute im Flugzeug. Kennen Sie dieses Gefühl? Sie sind nicht allein. Etwa ein Drittel aller Fluggäste fühlt sich beim Fliegen nicht wohl oder leidet unter Flugangst. Angst vor dem Fliegen ist weder ein Einzelschicksal noch

urls.title: ORF-TVthek
urls.description: Nachrichten, Magazine, Dokumentationen, Diskussionen, Kultur, Sport, Shows, Comedys, Filme, Serien, Regional- und Kindersendungen: Die Videoplattform ORF-TVthek bietet mehr als 200 ORF-TV-Sendungen als Livestream und Video-on-Demand an. Die Videoarchive erlauben zudem einen Blick ins ORF-Archiv zu zeit- und kulturgeschichtlichen Themen.

data.text:
4/4 In the first half of 2022, Austrian Airlines flew 4.2 million passengers, four times more compared to 2021 (1.1 mio). By June, short-time work was ended for all employees and the flag carrier started recruiting cabin crew members again in spring!
👉 https://t.co/mylh98LTMK

urls.title: Austrian Airlines mid-year result: Back on course with full planes - Austrian Airlines

data.text: 3/4 Due to the weak 1st quarter & increase in kerosene expenditure, adjusted EBIT in the 1st half of the year remains still negative (-106 mio. €), but show a significant improvement compared to 2021 (-198 mio. €).

2/4 By the end of June, Austrian Airlines has repaid 30% of the state-backed loan. CEO Annette Mann: “Thanks to full summer flights, Austrian Airlines is on the rise again. However, the ongoing pandemic, increases in fuel costs & economic uncertainties continue to challenge us.”

1/4 Back on course!
For the 1st time since the outbreak of the pandemic, Austrian Airlines reached a positive operating result of 2 mio. € in the 2nd quarter of 2022. In spite of many external challenges in the 1st half of 2022, 99% of all flights took off as scheduled. https://t.co/AZneTtZXwz

The art of reducing carbon emissions: Travel with #SAF to the #BiennaleArte2022 🎨✈️
Every ticket purchased with 100% #Sustainable Fuel from VIE to VCE now receives the climate-friendly journey to @flughafen_wien with the City Airport Train #CAT + free admission to @la_biennale! https://t.co/j9E1wiafeK

data.text: Going once, going twice, aaaaaaaaaand: SOLD! 💯💺✈️Austrian Airlines auctioned no longer required Economy Class plane seats, as well as more than 170 flight trolleys.🌎 With this charity auction, we collected almost 60.000 Euros for NGO Nachbar in Not.🙏 https://t.co/7jrQBiIZBi

¡Hola #Valencia! 

For the first time ever, today we took off from Vienna directly to the Spanish beauty at the Costa Blanca. Thank you for the warm welcome @aeroVLC! 🇪🇸🥘

#maidenflight #ServusValencia #lovingtheworld https://t.co/oxPqL9IcOA
👉 https://t.co/QyV1TifvcW

urls.title: Current information and flight irregularities
urls.description: Find out about current safety information and rules for travelling before you travel, and get flight information via text or email.

data.text: 3/3 Passengers are advised to check the status of their flight in advance on https://t.co/YLEBDoRZ3z. Customers who have booked through an (online) travel agency are asked to contact the respective travel agency. We sincerely apologize for this inconvenience.
2/3 Affected passengers who have given their telephone number or e-mail address as well as Miles & More members will be informed proactively about changes or rebookings.

1/3 The works councils for flying & commercial/technical staff are planning works meetings at Vienna Airport on June 2. Therefore, delays and flight cancellations will occur on the evening of June 1 & on June 2.

Austrian Airlines and all the Lufthansa Group Airlines would like to wish a Happy International Flight Attendant Day to all Flight Attendants out there!🎊🌎🛩 #servus #austrian #internationalflightattendantday #letscelebrate https://t.co/aEWS4OtnxD

data.text:
2/2 “It will be easier for our guests to discover the world in a carbon-neutral way. We are the only Austrian airline using #SustainableAviationFuels to make carbon-neutral flying possible for our guests," says CCO Michael Trestl.

#MakeChangeFly #SAF

👇https://t.co/wO1j8olEZX

1/2 Fly carbon-neutral with us! ✈️♻️
We have integrated 3 possibilities for carbon-neutral air travel directly into the flight booking procedure at https://t.co/YLEBDoRZ3z. Our passengers can now choose between #SAF, climate protection projects or a combination of both. https://t.co/jP3CzqfrsE

Paparazzi Alert 📸 🚨 at our #GateofFame ⭐️ and magic moments for our guests on today's OS81 ✈️
Hollywood's crème de la crème, Sandra Bullock, Marilyn Monroe and the Terminator himself kiss 😘 our passengers goodbye 👋🏼 Enjoy your flight to La La Land! 🇺🇸 https://t.co/VBqD1W8Yae

data.text:
Ready to snatch a fancy piece of aviation history? ✈️❤️
 
Together with #AURENA we are auctioning Eco Seats💺 from our B767-fleet & catering trolleys for a good cause! We will donate all proceeds to #NachbarInNot to support people in Ukraine! 🇺🇦
 
Bid now: https://t.co/9svyWZckpq https://t.co/Yf3v1X2iWa

This summer, Austrian Airlines will be back in the air with its entire fleet and a 20% increased offer to European holiday destinations. COO Francesco Sciortino: "We are ready for take-off into a summer in full operation!" 

Our financial results: 👇https://t.co/KhgT3p9AkV 

3/3

"We are currently recording six-figure booking numbers every week for May & June as well as for the summer holidays. Summer holiday flights are already filling up & business travel is also on the rise again. This dynamic makes us very confident!", says CCO Michael Trestl. 

2/3

data.text:
Our wonderful pilots provide us with countless memories, new discoveries and most importantly care, safety and hospitality above the clouds. 

On today’s #WorldPilotsDay we celebrate our heroes in the skies! 👩‍✈️ 👨‍✈️ https://t.co/xEW0l3kPCB

As a first mover in Austria we fuel our aircraft with 1,500 tons of SAF, saving CO2 emissions equivalent to over 330 flights from Vienna to London. Our SAF is produced locally at the refinery in Schwechat getting from there directly into our tanks! 2/2

👉https://t.co/Ri8UCI5Fyc https://t.co/5VClvaI4OC

How does your Schnitzel bring us one step closer to carbon neutrality? ♻️✈️

Since this March we are uplifting Sustainable Aviation Fuel made from Austrian used cooking oil from our longstanding partner @omv! 1/2

data.text: With the current #Fitfor55 proposals we risk massive competitive damages for EU Airlines & EU Airports. It will shift business and #emissions towards non-EU countries. We ask for policy changes to enable a global level playing field! @flughafen_wien https://t.co/hWbyQg3Np6

This year’s Easter egg hunt takes place in the Mediterranean  🐰✈️ 690,000 bookings within 2 weeks and +380% more bookings compared to 2021 on many routes 🌍We are very happy to have those record breaking numbers in our Easter nest 🙏🏻 Find out more ➡️ https://t.co/C8TBbSb7dw https://t.co/LjKTzGnEaJ

data.text:
#Servus and welcome back dear #YouthOlympicTeamAustria 🇦🇹 #Congrats 👏🏼 on your fanstastic performance and 10 medals 🥇🥈🥉at the #YoungOlympicFestival2022 in Finland 🇫🇮
We were happy to have you aboard again ✈️ https://t.co/LBw8qjVc6q

„Honey, I’m home!”

Our long haul fleet is finally complete again ❤️✈️

32 days and almost 15 flight hours later, the “Spirit of Austria” returned to #Vienna after its maintenance check in #Taipei!

#ServusB777 #LovingTheWorld https://t.co/kMZBL7vZSz

Happy Birthday to our flying Schnitzel! 🎉✈ Exactly one year ago, we started offering #sustainable and #regional Austrian delights on all short and medium-haul flights in Economy Class! 🌱🍽 For more info click here ➡ https://t.co/Nv5S1DqL8l https://t.co/lHnVI3uLfl

data.text:
Welcome back #ParalympicTeamAustria 🇦🇹 Congrats to your incredible performance and 13 medals! 🥇🥈🥉 Thanks for choosing the #charming way to fly back home! ✈️
#Paralympics2022 #Servus #AustrianAirlines https://t.co/e3LwPhi9LB

Last year, revenue and passenger numbers improved significantly compared to 2020, yet they accounted for only a third of the pre-crisis level. With the repayment of € 60 mio. of the state-guaranteed loan, we are fulfilling our responsibility towards Austrian taxpayers. 2/2

2021 was another year marked by the corona pandemic and its impact on the aviation industry. Despite another negative annual result, record bookings pave the runway towards summer. 🛫 1/2

👉 https://t.co/gJl4JSa9ai

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

data.text: Last year, revenue and passenger numbers improved significantly compared to 2020, yet they accounted for only a third of the pre-crisis level. With the repayment of € 60 mio. of the state-guaranteed loan, we are fulfilling our responsibility towards Austrian taxpayers. 2/2
We continue to monitor the situation closely and are in close exchange with the authorities.

Due to the current and emerging regulatory situation, Austrian Airlines will not use Russian airspace for the next seven days. Flights to Russia will be suspended during this period. Affected passengers will be informed accordingly.

#Servus and welcome back #OlympicTeamAustria 🇦🇹
Today the last athletes touched down in Vienna with extra valuable goods on board 🥇🥈🥉 We hope you had a pleasant flight with Austrian Airlines ✈️ Congrats to all athletes on their fantastic performance in #Beijing2022 https://t.co/4An69LrYD1

data.text:
#ServusNEOS: Our fleet gets a modern, fuel-efficient addition!🛫

As of August 2022 four new A320neos will replace our older aircraft. The NEOS do not only count with an innovative airspace cabin but also emit up to 3,700 tons of CO2 less per year.

👉 https://t.co/jcN5HXOZKj

Today, the aircraft with the prelude to the famous Waltz on its exterior dances its way to Taipei for all necessary maintenance work before returning to regular operations. In spring, the “Spirit of Austria” will again welcome you on board with Johann Strauss’ masterpiece!🎼

2/2

Of course it had to be on the 155th birthday of the “Donauwalzer”, the anthem of Austrian Airlines, that our last B777, the “Spirit of Austria”, is being woken up from storage! 🎵 ✈️ 💤

1/2 https://t.co/W38JDV4pAZ

#ServusAustrianApp
Check out our new App. In addition to the modern design that allows an easier use, the new Austrian app provides useful features and real-time info along the trip, as well as access to the entire #Lufthansa Group airlines offer ✈️
👉🏼 https://t.co/FnwyYhba6i https://t.co/GAj7bpWL74

data.text:
We are joining the fight against #FoodWaste!🥪

With our pilot project “Austrian Melangerie To Go” our flight guests can now save unconsumed products from our onboard product range from going to waste. 

Our goal? Reduce food waste to a minimum! 🗑️

👉 https://t.co/DVmMzTH29I https://t.co/yu6ISkCCm1

#AustrianAirlines is setting an example by already starting to #flygreener this year with the voluntary deployment of 1,500 tons of #SAF by @omv!

👉https://t.co/CGk09uS6Pw
2/2

@BMKlimaschutz

Ambitions are important, but we are already acting! 💪

We support the eager targets for the use of sustainable aviation fuels #SAF from 2025, but achieving them requires significant investments from national governments and should not distort competition. 
1/2
RT @lufthansaNews: Kontinuität beim Klimaschutz: Die globale Rating-Organisation @CDP hat der Lufthansa Group im vierten Jahr in Folge ein…

data.text:
West Coast, best coast?🤩

From 20 May, we will fly you non-stop from #Vienna to #LosAngeles with five weekly connections!✈️

This summer, our European route network will also be expanded with new destinations such as Valencia🇪🇸 & Kavala🇬🇷!

👉 https://t.co/nwDDGNJTEu https://t.co/6MM6e4wXnz

data.text: pretty legs dancing at sunrise... 💃🏽✈️🌅 https://t.co/pbNllr8S7g

In the recent holiday season, more than 360,000 passengers flew Austrian Airlines!✈️

Our high-demand flights to warm weather destinations such as Cancún, Malé or Mauritius will continue to be on our flight schedule for the remaining winter period!🌴

👉 https://t.co/4gLVZFgLvC https://t.co/T1Eyq2tcAs

Your time is precious! ⏰

Austrian Airlines is again among Europe’s top 10 most punctual airlines! In 2021, 89.6 percent of all Austrian Airlines arrivals were on time, which makes it Europe’s 7th most on-time airline in the performance ranking published by @cirium!

©Cirium https://t.co/B3cMLJ5TpA

By the end of this year, Austrian Airlines will have repaid one fifth of the state-guaranteed loan from 2020.
We will continue to be the red-white-red 🇦🇹 carrier at @flughafen_wien who connects Austria and the world! 🌎✈️

#ServusWelt #AustrianAirlines

👉https://t.co/vyCoIaUTf9
The entire Austrian #team wishes you and your loved ones a Merry Christmas and Happy Holidays. Take care & stay healthy! 🎄💫 https://t.co/DAwrYgZaT4

This week we received our first 100% electric car for our HON Circle limousine service at @flughafen_wien. The #PorscheTaycan completes our HON fleet of 4 vehicles, 2 of them being Porsche E-Hybrids. Our goal? Decarbonizing all of our HON rides in Vienna!🚗♻️
 
We #makechangefly! https://t.co/iHpsH8q9G4

data.text:
Ein kurzes "AUA" gegen Corona. 

#ServusImpfung #ZusammenGegenCorona #WeCare https://t.co/sUQCdwsYDc

Their home is the hangar ✈ 

Whether in maintenance or in the field of material & logistics: #AustrianAirlines’ background heroes ensure that 🇦🇹 stays connected with the 🌎 and that our aircraft are always at the safest level.  

Happy #InternationalCivilAviationDay! 👩🔧👨 https://t.co/YIWZKGcr1F

The fueling of 1,500 tons of SAF will save around 3,750 tons of CO2, which corresponds to the emissions of 333 flights Vienna-London!

We are grateful for our costumers’ commitment to finance the use of #SAF via #COMPENSAID!
👉https://t.co/urqjGC41SM
👉 https://t.co/sJGtUhveoV

data.text:
Austrian Airlines takes off to CO2-neutrality!♻️✈️

We are more than proud to announce our first delivery of Sustainable Aviation Fuel (SAF) from @omv! Starting March 2022, we can finally connect Austria with the world AND reduce our CO2-emissions. 
 
#MakeChangeFly https://t.co/TuxEaLKYjA

Off to the Caribbean! 🛫🌴

Starting 25 January, we add to our Cancún service with an additional weekly flight. During winter, we will fly directly from Vienna to the sunny Mexican holiday destination every Tuesday, Thursday and Sunday!

👉 https://t.co/cRv3xZhh6d https://t.co/HVQsa0zmX9

data.text:
Today is World AIDS Day! 🐻🌈

Our #diversifly team supports the local @aidshilfewien with our colleagues' contribution for their AIDS teddy bear. With this fundraising campaign we want to boost AIDS prevention and treatment in Austria!

#diversitymatters #diversiflywithus https://t.co/UtFvbKDkXl

data.text: Congrats 🥳 and thanks for getting your jab 💉on our #B777 last Saturday. One lucky winner will be able to fly fully vaccinated to #NYC and enjoy the Empire State of Mind! Austrian CCO Michael Trestl personally contacted the winner today. We wish you a pleasant flight! https://t.co/OwFK8e0uvq
Vaccinating to the waltz beat 💃 200 flight enthusiasts got their jab in the #B777 today. Thanks to @flughafen_wien and @roteskreuznoe for teamwork ✈️💉 https://t.co/MZ7YYelvcm

Spread your wings and get vaccinated! 💉✈️
This Saturday, we transform one of our #B777 into a one of a kind vaccination center. Together with @flughafen_wien & @roteskreuznoe we invite you to get your jab and win tickets to #NYC on top of immunity! 

👉https://t.co/fwsstMoae6 https://t.co/jn3iXLydII

As always, it was a pleasure having you on Board @skrapid! ⚽ Next time, we will fly you to a win again! ⚽💪🏼

#Servus #AustrianAirlines #Rapid #SKRapidWien #SCR #DZGSCR https://t.co/OHFpHPBLcO

Ready, set, SMILE!🤗
From 9 Nov, @Miles_and_More members can use our biometrics facial recognition service and enjoy contactless boarding! Together with @flughafen_wien we want to make your journey as smooth as possible! 

More Info: https://t.co/CW3UGQ6iZ0

#ConnectingTheWorld https://t.co/PWkptZgVxP

Italian support for the Hirschwang region in Lower Austria!

Austrian Airlines currently holds two Italian #Canadair fire-fighting aircraft in our hangar at @flughafen_wien  to support the local firefighters. We hope for the soon end of the fires! 🙏 

#LovingTheWorld #heroes https://t.co/5Np2UKssC0

data.text:
With a heavy heart we say goodbye to our #B767 OE-LAW! 
Today, our crew is operating the aircraft’s last regular flight going to New York 👋🏼 #Servus https://t.co/KeAuIZsc2X

#ServusThailand! On 1 November gates will open again for fully vaccinated travelers from Austria and other countries! 🌴🇹🇭

With up to five weekly flights to Bangkok we bring you closer to the fascination of #Thailand.

#Lovingtheworld #TogetherAgain #SoutheastAsia https://t.co/rD7iLa38zQ

We carry Austria in our ❤ and into the world!

Happy National Day, Austria! 🇦🇹
 
#Servus #AustrianNationalDay #CharmingAustria https://t.co/hdk2QnYaEY
